about_the_game:
We've teamed up with cosplayer MiMi Chan for this official cosplay set of Enishia from Enishia and the Binding Brand by Shimobashira Workshop!

This Cosplay DLC includes images of a cosplayer cosplaying as Enishia from the game.

Features:
  • Cosplay images of Enishia
detailed_description:
We've teamed up with cosplayer MiMi Chan for this official cosplay set of Enishia from Enishia and the Binding Brand by Shimobashira Workshop!

This Cosplay DLC includes images of a cosplayer cosplaying as Enishia from the game.

Features:
  • Cosplay images of Enishia
legal_notice: © Kagura Games and Shimobashira Workshop, All Rights Reserved.
name: Enishia and the Binding Brand - Official Enishia Cosplay by MiMi Chan

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 11/10/8
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

short_description: This Cosplay DLC includes images of a cosplayer cosplaying as Enishia from the game!
